name: Tank Simulator Т-34-85
description:
T-34-85 Tank of Victory is a unique tank simulator with realistic physics and addictive gameplay!

Take control of the T-34-85 and win the battle.

- Two Tanks to choose from (T-34-85, KV-85)

- Unique Allied Tanks (KV-KwK 40 L / 48, M4 with Tiger Tower and others)

- Realistic physics of penetration

- Realistic suspension physics

- Two Cards 1000x1000 meters

- Beautiful graphics

- Realistic sound (Shots, Engines)

- Various opponents (Panzerkampfwagen VI Tiger, Pz.Kpfw. IV,)

-------------------------

Control

Traffic:

W - Pressing a few times, you upshift

S - Pressing a few times, you downshift

Space - Stop Tank

Shooting:

Shift - Aim the weapon

R - Go to sight mode

Mouse 1 - Shot

Mouse 2 - Camera Overview

Mouse 2 + Scroll - change camera zoom

Click on the scroll - Fix the sight on one point
